Comments: please see website on steroid asthma inhalers and nasal sprays: www.sidefxdrugs.com

Side Effects: Insomnia_ anxiety_ agitation_ unprovoked hostility.  I got very mean and short-tempered.  It sure relieved the allergy symptoms_ but it's not worth it with being yanked around emotionally.  I was told later that I had a reaction to the steroid in the medicine.
